document.full_text: more than 200 members of syria's ruling baath party quit on wednesday over president bashar al-assad's violent repression of pro-democracy protests, the first public sign of serious dissent within the governing ranks.
document.title: baathists quit over syria's deraa crackdown
lines_and_colors: more than 200 members of syria's ruling baath party quit on wednesday over president bashar al-assad's violent repression of pro-democracy protests, the first public sign of serious dissent within the governing ranks.
